title: Guillermo Solovey
text:
Professor at the University of Buenos Aires, on leave. Currently Visiting Professor at the Business School of Torcuato Di Tella University.
Independent Researcher at CONICET.
Chair of the Instituto de Cálculo.
Full CV
Research interests: cognitive science, statistics, data science.
